pages.text: The $(item)Apiary Breeder$() is an automated way to breed bees.$(br2)To use the breeder you must capture each parent bee in a jar and place the filled jars in the appropriate slots.$(br2)You would then need to determine which

flowers each parent needs to trigger its "love" state and place them in the proper slots.$(br2)Lastly, supply empty jars for the child bee to be put into.$(br2)The breeder always runs, but it only consumes resources when it can place a filled jar into the $(l:resourcefulbees:apiary/apiary_storage)$(item)Apiary Storage$().

By default each breed process takes 2 minutes, however this can be reduced through the use of upgrades.$(br2)In addition, only one breed process can occur unless breed upgrades are used in which case the max is five breeds at once.
The breeder is an optional block that that can be added to an Apiary Structure.
